Problem.Subject: INV: error crash inventory client
Problem.description:
After cslt with MMR and BHR Problem Ticket created
 
At our customer Yamaha we have an issue regarding the Inventory client. This app crashes some times in the morning when the system is booting.
 
[Bild]
 
 Attached the last crash Dump Files and Logfiles
THN:
my Status for Day 1:
 
* investigate the Error very difficult
* error occurs not every time
* new Inventory Debug in Version 16.0.3 received.
* Advanced Logging enabled
* Expect tomorrow crashdumpfiles
** HP Optiplex 490 G1 MT
 
my opinion :
 
1. Network Timing problem, most crash the Inventory in the Morning, i started some machines whole the day and the Inventory dont Crash @logon
only in NL happens, other Location over WAN the Inventory not Crash
2. maybe Dot.Net 4.6.1 issue with the LanguagePackages
 
we discuss a Update of Empirum V16.1, so its based on Dot.Net 4.6.1 and its solved a other Problem with a Software-Installation Requirement.
 
we makes also some Changes in AgentTemplate (Disable failed Installation 3)
Ask a User for Reboot @90 min
 
Reboot Change in the Fastviewer Package
Problem.Solution: Bei Yamaha hat die Änderung bezüglich Excludieren von Patches geholfen. Es wurdne keine Abstürze mehr festgestellt.

Problem.Subject: Update to 8.1.3 may fail on script P02810053002 because date is not in ISO format
Problem.description:
Symptoms:
The update to 8.1.3 may fail on a date type out of range exception:
Error occurred while processing update script '02-81-0053_post_Update_TimeZoneOffset (C:\Temp\1\RarSFX0\program files\Matrix42\Matrix42 Workspace Management\Config\Platform\P02810053002.post)'. See inner exception for details.
Error occurred while processing update script '02-81-0053_post_Update_TimeZoneOffset (C:\Temp\1\RarSFX0\program files\Matrix42\Matrix42 Workspace Management\Config\Platform\P02810053002.post)'. See inner exception for details. Bei der Konvertierung eines varchar-Datentyps in einen datetime-Datentyp liegt der Wert außerhalb des gültigen Bereichs.Bei der Konvertierung eines varchar-Datentyps in einen datetime-Datentyp liegt der Wert außerhalb des gültigen Bereichs.Bei der Konvertierung eines varchar-Datentyps in einen datetime-Datentyp liegt der Wert außerhalb des gültigen Bereichs.Bei der Konvertierung eines varchar-Datentyps in einen datetime-Datentyp liegt der Wert außerhalb des gültigen Bereichs.Bei der Konvertierung eines varchar-Datentyps in einen datetime-Datentyp liegt der Wert außerhalb des gültigen Bereichs.
This is maybe the case because non ISO Date format is used.
Example
INSERT INTO TimeZoneOffsets
(TimezoneId,DisplayName,StandardName,BaseUtcOffsetMinutes,SupportsDaylightSavingTime,DaylightDateStart,DaylightDateEnd,DaylightDeltaMinutes,Year)
VALUES ('Russia Time Zone 11','(UTC+12:00) Anadyr, Petropavlovsk-Kamchatsky','Russia TZ 11 Standard Time',720,1,'1900-01-01 01:01:01.000','2009-12-31 00:00:00.000',60,1900)
I changed the date format in the hole script to ISO 2009-12-31 00:00:00.000 > 2009-12-31T00:00:00.000 and now it work. please find the script attached, recheck it and update the setup.exe

Problem.Subject: Depot Sync Error Message: Cannot convert some time settings to correct date. Please correct configuration (sycfile).
Problem.description:
MHN 01.08.2013
Die Rückmeldung von betroffenen Kunden lassen darauf schließen, dass die Jobs am 01.08.2013 wieder laufen.
Hier drei Rückmeldungen von Kunden:  
momentan laufen die Sync Jobs stabil. Kann allerdings nicht sagen, ob das
weiterhin so bleibt.  
Wir haben auf allen unseren Windows 2008 R2 x84 Servern die englische
Version installiert.  
------------------------------------------------  
auch bei uns liefen heute morgen die SyncJobs wieder, ohne das wir noch was gemacht haben.  
Unser Datenbank Server ist auf Windows Server 2008 R2 SP1 in Englisch.  
------------------------------  
Wir haben insgesamt 7 Depot-Server am laufen, alle haben Windows Server 2003 R2 Standard-Edition SP 2 in Deutsch installiert.  
Aber:
Nur EINER davon hatte diese Probleme !!!
  
MHN 01.08.2013:
Von zwei Kunden habe ich die Rückmeldung, dass am 01.08.2013 der Sync wieder läuft. Ein Kunde, der US Zeichensatz / Zeiteinstellungen hat, hat berichtet, dass die Syncs trotz der Meldung " Error Message: Cannot convert some time settings to correct date. Please correct configuration (sycfile)." im  Sync Monitor liefen.  
MHN 31.07.2013: Ein Kunde hat von diesem Problem auch in de rVersion 14.2 berichtet. In seinem Fall wurden diese ms Hotfixes eingespielt: KB2151757  kb2467173 kb982573 eingespielt.
Hier last sich der Dienst auch nach dem Löschen der Zeitstempel aus der Registry nicht mehr vöschen.  
   
MHN 31.07.2013: Weiteres Empsync Verzeichnis eines weiteren Kunden hinzugefügt, bei dem alle Jobs in den Fehler laufen. Leider lassen sich die Jobs einmal manuell ausführen nachdem die Keys gelöscht wurden. Der nächste Lauf nach Zeitplaner 
scheitert dann wieder.  
Da in kurzem Abstand, gleiche Störungsmeldung von drei Kunden,- Immediate und ein HF Request.  
1. Detailed Problem Descrition:  
Bei Start eines Sync Jobs erscheint im Sync Monitor die Meldung:
" Cannot convert some time settings to correct date. Please correct configuration "
Dies ist plötzlich und unerwartet am 30.07.2013 aufgetreten.

Unabhängig vom Betriebssystem.  
2. Affected Product, File Versions:  
15.1.1  
3. Steps to Reproduce:
Sync Job mit einem Zeitplaner wie im Attachment zu sehen anlegen und den Job starten  
4. Actual Result:  
Die Meldung Cannot convert some time settings to correct date. Please correct configuration erscheint  
5. Anticipated Result:  
Der Job wird ausgeführt.  
6. Possible Error Reason:  
Probleme mit dem konvertieren der Werte unter:
HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Wow6432Node\matrix42\Central\Misc\EmpSync\BackupStatus  
Löscht man die Keys, dann lassen sich die Jobs manuell ausführen. Beim nächsten, geplanten  Start erscheint wieder die Meldung.
  
7. Attachments:
Screenshot des Sync Monitors
Paket eines Jobs in dem die Zeitplaner Einstellungen ersichtlich sind.
Es hängt wohl von den Zeitplanereinstellungen ab, den bei einigen Kunden sind nur einige Jobs betroffen, bei anderen Kunden alle Jobs.
Problem.Solution:
https://matrix42.box.com/shared/static/yssg5ne9btc05wusoq3s.zip Version 14.2.1
https://matrix42.box.com/shared/static/00p26ao9ej8cow0wiedv.zip Version 15.1.0

Problem.Subject: In some cases, substitutions don't expire although the delegation date is already exceeded.
Problem.description:
Inquiry from DMK:
Hi,
customer has a issue with the delegate function:
A user defines a substitute for a specific time span. so far no problem, the delegate function works proper to this point. But after the substitution expires, the user which was in the role of the substitute still get approval messages. 
note: This don't happened every time. 
Any ideas? Is such a case already known? We could not reproduce it so far, but it seems to happen at least on some 7.2.1 installations.
Thanks
Daniel
-------------

Answer to Inquiry from: Zhushma, Vasiliy 
Hi,
According to error messages in log, there is a bug, related to DateTime values formatting in ActualProxyPerson calculation. This bug caused the ActualProxyPerson attribute not updated (cleared) for some days.
Please create a PRB on this issue.
Problem.Solution: 2015-11-26 ODR:  SqlException, that caused the Proxy Person calculation issue was reproduced, and then successfully tested on BPM Main Continuous 8.0.3.1570 20151126 1100.1

Problem.Subject: Empirum Import creates on every import new rows in table SPSInventoryClassApplication
Problem.description:
Symptoms:  
Empirum Import creates on every import new rows in table SPSInventoryClassApplication
This Problem is already known please refer to TFS ID: 49879  
As a side result the Archiv.mdf will grow very fast. We got Customer with about 100 GB + Archiv.mdf files.  
Prerequisites:  
Maybe Hotfix Hotfix_5.32.0904_20120531 - PRB24201.zip should be installed.  
Reproduction:    
start empirum konnektor  
Result:  
Empirum konnektor shows all inv. application inserted again  
Expected Result:  
Only new inv. Applications should be inserted.  
Solutiontext from TFS:
2012-08-02 TLU: Successfully rested with "5.33 ContinuousBuild SP3 P2 5.33.929.0 20120802 0756..1". Contained in 5.3 Sp3 P2
Problem fixed, there was a logical error with AUT data, so to retest the issue, the imported Clients should contain AUT data. The AUT data must have several entries for one client and one application to see the issue.
The test should also include the import of a new client with AUT data and a check if this generates double fingerprint associations.
A second issue was detected during the inmplementation of the fix, it looks like after the first import the second import on a client (without changed inventory date) sets the OS fingerprint to uninstalled.
I recommend also a retest of these two Problems:
PRB24201, PRB24205

Problem.Subject: LIS processing's first step might get stuck
Problem.description:
Symptoms:
LIS Update my get stuck in step "identify own Software Products for which a LIS template may exist".  
Impact:
LIS file download and import work. Since this step may cause load the hostcommon service has to be restarted to terminate this.  
Prerequisites:
none  
Reproduction:
Perfom LIS update using LIS Update wizard  
Result:
LIS file is downloaded and imported. However the step "identify own Software Products for which a LIS template may exist" does not end and needs to be terminated by restarting hostcommon service  
2014-05-13 05:44:15,840 INFO 25 LCM (null) (null) (null) (null) 7.0.0.1290 - Activating LIS processing...
2014-05-13 05:44:15,856 INFO 25 LCM (null) (null) (null) (null) 7.0.0.1290 - LIS Update: Running step 'Schritt 1/10: Eigene Softwareprodukte identifizieren, für die möglicherweise passende LIS Vorlage existiert'
(=identify own Software Products for which a LIS template may exist).  
Expected Result:
LIS Update runs and finshes normally  
Workaround:
Run LIS Update and restart hostcommon service when all import steps are completed.
Problem.Solution: fixed processing castom software during LIS update

Problem.Subject: Connection to drvcomm.matrix42.de can not be established
Problem.description:

In most invironmonets doesn't solve the issue or is not applicable due to security reasons. Since updating Empirum to Version 15 SP1 the connection to the driver ftp (drvcomm.matrix42.de) leeds to errors - see debugview log.

2. Click EMC -> Configuration - OS-Installer - Hardware - Tools - Synchronize

The synchronization can't be executed (Error 403 in Debugview Log)

for squid proxy server

...
acl SSL_ports port 443 21 50000-50300
...

insert  datatransfer in active / passive mode

Problem.Subject: Error in Setup.exe of Empirum 15.1
Problem.description:
1) detailed description
With Setup.exe 15.0.0.466 (and earlier) all of the following commandswill be executed without a problem:

call %src%\folder\doit.bat

cd ..
call folder\doit.bat

call ..\folder\doit.bat

With Setup.exe 15.1.0.664, the last command fails with an error message 
"cannot execute command "call ..\Folder\doit.bat" - error 2"
(see screenshot below), 
This syntax is often used in Empirum Job Drivers.
If "cd .. & call folder\doit.bat" works, then "call ..\folder\doit.bat" should work, too.
  
2) product Information
Empirum 15.1 (Setup.exe 15.1.0.664)
  
3) steps to reproduce
put the above commands into a Setup.inf, add "Folder" and a batch file (here: doit.bat)
and execute Setup.exe 15.1 with this Setup.inf
  
4) actual result
"call ..\Folder\doit.bat" will not be executed
  
5) expected result  
"call ..\Folder\doit.bat" will be executed, as well as "cd .. & call ...."  
  
6) possible cause from the view of support
-  
7) Attachments  
-  
################ Customer's mail ###############################################  
Hallo Supporter,  
bei Empirum V15 SP1 kann die setup.exe Call ..\bla\setup.exe nicht mehr interpretieren.   
Dieses führt insbesondere bei der Treiber-Installation mit EmpirumJob zu Problemen.  
  
[Setup]  
Version=6.5  
ShowCaption=1  
[Application]  
ShowEndMessage=0  
DisableCancelButton=1  
SrcDir=..  
[Options]  
Commands = Commands, COPYALWAYS  
[Commands]  
Call ..\VMwareTools\Setup.exe /s /v"/qb-! REBOOT=REALLYSUPPRESS" funktioniert nicht.  
  
CD ..  
Call VMwareTools\Setup.exe /s /v"/qb-! REBOOT=REALLYSUPPRESS" funktioniert.  
  
Call %SRC%\VMwareTools\Setup.exe /s /v"/qb-! REBOOT=REALLYSUPPRESS" funktioniert.  
  
  
  
  
  
Mit der Setup.exe aus V15 ohne SP1 funktioniert das noch.  
  
Damit ist für mich das am Montag geplante Update beim Kunden Delvag gestoppt, da ich nicht alle EmpirumJob-Treiber anpassen werde.

Problem.Subject: V14.1 und V14.1 P01: mutual software dependencies cannot be created
Problem.description:
1) Detailed Description
If you try to create software dependencies in the depot for packages A and B, to allow an installation for package A only if package B is installed (or not installed), and to allow an installation for package B only if package A is installed (or not installed), then an error message "This package cannot be inserted due to a circular reference" is displayed when creating the second dependency.  
2) Product Information
Empirum V14.1 and V14.1.1  
3) Steps to reproduce
try to create software dependencies as it is described above  
4) actual result
second dependency cannot be created  
5) expected result
second dependency can be created  
6) possible reasons from the view of support
-  
7) attachments
-  
#######################customer's mail##################################################################################################

Problem.Subject: SP 1 wird bei Win7 import nicht erkannt
Problem.description:
Wenn der Kunde Win7 SP1 importieren möchte wird das SP 1 nicht erkannt. Sobald er im Dialog die Service Pack version angezeigt bekommt, steht dort eine 0. 

Kunde benutzt Waik nicht richtig sondern hat nur eine DLL dazukopiert. Bzw es ist etwas undefinierbar.
Problem.Solution:
Wie schon in der Beschreibung erwähnt, war die falsche Nutzung des WAIK (copy statt Installation und Import) das Problem.
Im Support war ebenfalls falsch gegengetestet worden (WAIK 2.0 statt unterstützter 1.1).

### FLL
Lösung auch für V12R2_SP3  -->  EisSoftware.dll

Problem.Subject: Editing with Package Editor exetremely slowly
Problem.description:
##### <Reproduced by RGT> #####  
  
Problem Description:  
  
Scripting with Package Editor is not possible because it is very slowly. Sign by sign is displayed with a big delay.  
  
Product Information:  
Packaging Center 15.0.0.466  
Tested on Win7 64 Bit  
  
Steps to reproduce:  
Open the PE and try to edit a Setup.inf  
  
Expected Result:  
It is possible to edit the setup.inf  
  
Actual Result:  
The Package Editor works extreme slowly.  
  
Possible Error Reason:  
Malfunction of Package Editor.

Also login to share EMC via Citrix failes.

Could not be reproduced by support but happens in customer connection (not only one customer)

Login can be made

DB Problem with accounts

It seems that Windows 2003 servers are effected only.  
  
  
Attachments:  
Screenshots and Debugview.log on Server with login via RDP from 12.12.2012

Problem.Subject: Transfer hangs by setting of min. bandwith
Problem.description:
### <RGT> ###  
could not be reproduced by support but wasreported by customer and neo42  
  
Problem Description:  
  
Agent with Setting “Min. bandwith” is unable to download all assigned Softwarepackages.  
  
Product Information:  
  
15.1 Patch 7, with Hotfix PRB26686  
Win 7 64 Bit  
  
Steps to reproduce:  
Configure Agent, e.g. min. bandwith 2048 kbit, and assign 20 Software packages.  
  
Actual Result:  
There are at least more than one Ipfer.exe open in the Taskmanger and it happens that one iper.exe will not be closed anymore. In this moment the download hangs.   
  
Expected Result:  
All iperf.exe will be closed, the download will be completed.
Problem.Solution:
min 3 measurements, max 12 measurements

Should a min Bandwidth be requested for ERIS?

TODO: Test on a system with more than one processor.

limits:
((10000 > (downSpeedAll / filecount) && 3 <= filecount)) // stop measuring after 3 valid measures and a measured speed lower than 10000 kbit/s
((45000 > (downSpeedAll / filecount) && 6 <= filecount)) // stop measuring after 6 valid measures and a measured speed lower than 45000 kbit/s
((100000 > (downSpeedAll / filecount) && 9 <= filecount)) // stop measuring after 9 valid measures and a measured speed lower than 100000 kbit/s


26.08.2014 wbe
Dokument  https://drive.google.com/a/matrix42.com/?tab=mo#folders/0BygcbJnxJFSFb2FjXzFTeHZ6LUk

Problem.Subject: Service storecrashes when adding a second ADAccount, which is related to a person, to another person.
Problem.description:
Symptoms:  
Service storecrashes when adding a second ADAccount, which is related to a person, to another person.  
Reason is on SQL side. The Statement does not finish. This was only reproducible on costumer side.
MAS investigated it and has the solution.  
Prerequisites:  
Person A with Account A
Person B with Account B  
Reproduction:    
open Person A  
go to accounts  
add account B  
save  
Result:  
SQL Statement will be blocked. Service store does not Response any more.  
Expected Result:  
Account is assigned.  
MAS already solved this Problem. Please Forward to him.  
Logs attached, you can find processdumps here:
https://drive.google.com/a/matrix42.com/folderview?id=0B2wpaXJT6fp2NmJDeVhna0thMHc&usp=sharing
Problem.Solution: fixed

Problem.Subject: LDAP Connector fills "AccountName" with account displaystring
Problem.description:
Build: Workspace Management 2014 SP 1 und höher 7.2.1.1345
Customer: Interseroh

Mir ist aufgefallen, dass der Anzeigename vom AD Benutzerkonto in das Feld "T(SPSAccountClassBase).AccountName" importiert wird. Auf der unteren Hardcopy lässt sich das erkennen. Im Feld Account Name (gelb markiert) muss der Benutzeranmeldename (siehe auch Hardcopy von der MMC) importiert werden und nicht nochmal der Anzeigename, für den es bereits ein Feld gibt. Dieses Feld Account Name bitte nicht mit dem im Dialog angezeigten Anmeldename des Benutzers verwechseln, das ist das Feld "T(SPSAccountClassAD).NBAccountname und in der MMC der Benutzernameldename (Prä-Windows 2000).

[cid:image001.png@01D03BDE.28BDA4C0]


[cid:image002.png@01D03BDE.89A31810]

Problem.Subject: Workflows which are on activity "wait for activity" do not run after update to 7.2 or 7.2.1 anymore
Problem.description:
Hello,

on Saturday we installed the update to 7.2.1 . It seems that we now have a problem in the service catalog.
We use a provisioning workflow that waits for a task to be closed, then the Service gets provisioned.

Tasks that have been created before the update and gets closed now still have the state "Provisioning pending"
For new orders it seems to work.



Regards,

Fabian Rechenberger
IT Operations Support, Senior System Administrator
Magna Global IT

Kurfürst-Eppstein-Ring 5
D-63877 Sailauf, Germany
Phone: +49 6093 9942 4554 I Mobile: +49 162 2453 982
Email: fabian.rechenberger@magna.com

This email is intended only for the person(s) to whom it is addressed and may contain information that is privileged, confidential or otherwise exempt from disclosure and may also be protected by copyright. Unauthorized use, retention, dissemination or copying is prohibited. If you are not the intended recipient, please destroy all copies of this e-mail and any attachments and notify the sender immediately by return email. Thank you.
Problem.Solution:
OGN: fixed

1.Have WM 7.1.1.
2.Run several Change management WH Instances (Create Change -> Agree change), that use Get Data Activity
3.Update to 7.2.1
4. Close 1 of the tasks related to your instances
5. run C:\Program Files (x86)\Matrix42\Matrix42 Workplace Management\bin
6. Close ne more related task (for other instance)

Result: 
---first instance is resumed after step 5.
---second instance is resumed absolutely naturally immediately after task close.

Problem.Subject: ActivationService writes wrong syntax for requirement, if requirement is an OR-Class
Problem.description:
### <RGT> ###
 
Problem Description:
ActivationService writes wrong syntax for requirement into the SWdepot.dds, if requirement is an OR-Class 
 
 
Product Information:
16 Update 1, ActivationService.exe 16.0.1.1700 
 
Steps to reproduce:
Define an OR-Class.
Set this OR-Class as requirement for another package
 
Expected Result:
correct, e.g.
Requirements="EmpirumPackages\Microsoft\Office Professional Plus (32Bit) DE\15.0" | "$Matrix42Packages$\GPL\Notepad++ (32Bit) MUI\6.6.8" | "$Matrix42Packages$\Adobe Systems\Reader (32Bit) DE\11.0.08"
 
Actual Result:
False, e.g.
Requirements= ( "Adobe Systems\Reader (32Bit) DE\11.0.08" | "GPL\Notepad++ (32Bit) MUI\6.6.8" | "Microsoft\Office Professional Plus (32Bit) DE\15.0" )
Problem.Solution: PRB28007: ActivationService writes wrong syntax for requirement, if requirement is an OR-Class

Problem.Subject: Cropped text lines and missing "bullet" and "numeration" signs in incidents
Problem.description:
Symptoms: 
Cropped text lines on the left side and missing "bullet", "numeration" and some "dash" signs in incidents.
If a text with "bullet" and "numeration" signs is beeing processed by email Robot, than it crops some text on the left side
 
Prerequisites:
None
 
Reproduction:
Send an email with the text from the attachment "Email.msg" to the Service Desk, so the email Robot creates an incident from this email.
Check the description of the created incident
 
Result: 
In the created incident there are missing "bullet" and "numeration" signs.
 
Expected Result:
"Bullet", "numeration" and "dash" signs should be visible properly like in the email text
 
Additional Information:
Issue can be reproduced in Version 8.0.2.1580 too
 
Attachments:
 -          Screenshots 
missing "bullet", "numeration" and "dash" signs in the created incident:
[Bild]
 
cropped text (on the left side)
[Bild]
Problem.Solution: Removed style attribute "text-indent" from white list in HTML sanitizer. Gmail web client also removes this attribute.

Problem.Subject: Workflowinstances in state on hold which are started before update to 8.1.0.1560 may cannot resumed by workflow enigne
Problem.description:
Symptoms:
This issue happened on 2 customer environment till now:
Since the update to 8.1.0.1651 old workflow instances from before the update stop working. Approval/task is closed, but workflow does not continue.
VZI and PBI already investigated the issue:
The problem was in loading suspended WFs because SPSPrincipal class was changed and cannot be deserialized. Error described in attached file WFLoadException.xml from WCF trace log. Create PRB for this and request hotfix if needed. 


Ask VZI for details if needed.
Prerequisites:
customer environments:
customer databases are uploaded on 10.5.10.51\CUSTOMERDB
Databases for this issue having prefix T128278 and T128149.
  
for T128149 there look for the related workflows of changes which are started before 3.6.2016
for T128278 look for approvals which are startet before 3.6.2016
SQl login
sa
Matrix42
or a windows login for everything
sup\m42service
m42service
Reproduction:
1. Create Change request
2. Start Change WF
3. Change approval created
these steps are done in previous build
update to 8.1.0 before step#4
4. Approve change approval
Result:
Workflows don't resume
Expected Result:
workflows should resume
For the hotfix we also need the option to resume the instances which did not continue

Problem.Subject: SWDepotLog service does not delete imported PXE logs
Problem.description:
0.  Title
SWDepotLog service does not delete imported PXE logs.
 
1.  Reproduced by:  customer
2.  Affected version(s)
Empirum:        V16.1.1
3.  Use case
Getting software installation log and inventory data.
4.  Impact for the customer
No software installation log and inventory information at new installed clients.
5.  Reproduction
The problem seems to occur at the customer at new installed clients by offline depots. 
Actual Result:
The PXE logs are red by the service but not deleted. The effect is that the service again and again reads the files and therefore overwrites existing SWDepot Log entries and inventory data.
Expected Result:
The PXE logs are red by the service and deleted.
6.  Workaround and Notes.
Workaround available: Manually delete the log files.
 
7.  Resources
Attachments:
EMPSRV101.LOG

Problem.Subject: PMv3: All patches in patchgroups are gettings deleted since patchcatalog release on 05.01.2016
Problem.description:
1. Reproduced by 
AHN, KFX, Customer (T140305, T140302, T140301)
 
2. Affected Version(s)
16.0.3, 16.1.x & 16.0.0 (GRZ)
   
3. Use case
Just make a catalog sync

Just make a catalog sync, automatically or via force, and when it is finished all patches are deleted from database. All patchgroups then have a size of 1 KB. No more patching is possible. No clientdetails for installed patches etc. are available.
 
Additional information: This is since release of catalog on 5th of January, catalog version is: 2.0.2.1422

No workaround available!

Problem.Subject: Patchmanagement bricht mit Internal Server Error 302 ab

Es gibt ein Problem mit dem Download von mit dem Error 302. Es sind scheinbar alle Kunden betroffen deren Empirum Server mit den neusten MS Patches bestückt wurde

Problem.Subject: Error “connection is busy with results for another hstmt” after qualifying a new computer

#V15#  
##### Reproduced by <JMT > #####  
Detailed problem description:  
Error “connection is busy with results for another hstmt” after qualifying a new computer.  
  
Affected product, file versions:  
Version (Build): Empirum 14.1 and 14.2 and 14.2.1 and 14.2.2

.

Problem.Subject: Probleme mit der EmpInventory.exe 64bit?
Problem.description:
Sehr geehrte Damen und Herren  
  
Sind evtl. bei Ihnen Probleme mit der EmpInventory.exe 64bit bekannt?  
  
Ich frage deshalb weil ich seit geraumer Zeit beobachte, dass der Inventar bei diversen PCs (alle 64bit) nicht ausgeführt werden kann. Immer dieselbe Meldung -> siehe Anhang.  
  
  
Dies hat zur Folge, dass Windows-Neuinstallationen hängen bleiben, weil da der Inventar ja auch ausgeführt wird. Diese PCs werden einfach nicht inventarisiert.  
  
Führt man auf 64bit-PCs die 32bit-Inventarisierung manuell aus, funktioniert dies…  
  
Ich bin nicht sicher, aber vielleicht liegt das ja an der Version 14.2.0.119? Ist Ihnen diesbezüglich irgendetwas bekannt?
Problem.Solution: Problem ist bereits im TFS geschlossen

Problem.Subject: EPE 3.40 can not do EOL
Problem.description:
1. Detailed Problem Description:  
When running EOL with EPE 3.40 it runs into an error  
  
2. Affected Product, File Versions:  
Tested with EPE 3.40
Tested with EPE 3.34  
  
3. Steps to Reproduce:  
Activate client for EOL
Choose an Bootimage created from EPE 3.40  
  
4. Actual Result:  
EPE tells the variable OS had no value  
  
5. Anticipated Result:  
checked: Indeed this variable has a value: 12
Therefor it should do EOL  
  
6. Possible Error Reason:  
retest with EPE 3.34: Now it works and tells: End of Life is choosen  
  
7. Attachments:  
OS.ini from my test  
Screenshot from customer's environment showing the error.  
  
  
original description from customer:  
  
Hallo Supporter,  
Fehler bei Empirum 14.1 Patch 2.  
  
Mit EPE Kernel 3.40 funktioniert kein EndofLife.  
osinst.eis kann nicht erstellt werden.  
  
  
Ältere Kernel funktionieren.  
Gleiches Problem besteht in meiner Empirum 14.2 Patch 1 Testumgebung.  
  
  
Herr Richter hatte ein Ticket zu diesem Problem eröffnet, das von Ihnen genannte wird es sein.  
Da er ca. 100 Maschinen löschen muss und die Zeit drängt, hat er sich in seiner Not an neo42 gewendet.  
Ich habe heute, wie beschrieben festgestellt, dass mit EPE Kernel 3.40 kein EndofLife funktioniert.  
Herr Richter löscht jetzt mit EPE Kernel 3.34 und es funktioniert.  
  
  
  
Mit freundlichem Gruß

Problem.Subject: Start screen license information shows "..." instead of company name
Problem.description:
Symptoms:
Service Store start screen does not display company name the application is licensed for  
Prerequisites:
none  

Reproduction:    
perform IIS reset  
start console and look at start screen  

Result:
Start screen says  
Licenced for: ...  

Expected Result:
Start screen shoud say  
Licenced for:
Problem.Solution:
23/09/2013 chech on environment192.168.20.25. Affter running Setup Wizard in Update mode - issue disapeared

System changes the version and company name during setup(at update/install wizard)
For that, valid certificate with the name "m42ServiceManagementPlatform" must exist in <InstallationFolder>/Certificates
open your certificate and make sure that there is node like "<customer name="matrix42+AG"/>" with the company name
If there is no - certificate is invalid
Also, in case everything is ok, try clean ASP.NEt server cache

Editing certficate will not help - request new from matrix42

Problem.Subject: Error message when opening a filter: The connection is allocated with another hstmt.
Problem.description:
Empirum V14.1 Patch 2
Error message when opening a filter: The connection is allocated with another hstmt. Also refer to attached screenshots.  
Actualisation of the DB was executed with the Scripts.  
Also refer to PRB22817 - Die Verbindung ist mit Ergebnissen von einem anderen hstmt belegt  
  

Nach Empirum Update auf o. Version kommt es beim Öffnen von FIltern (auf das plus klicken) zur besgaten Fehlermeldung aus Anhang Dok1.pdf.

Dieses Problem tritt in der Console sowohl unter Administration als auch unter Inventory auf. Es gab schon mal einen Bugfix bei einer älteren Version mit gleichem Problem.

Betrifft den Kunden Landesamt für Umwelt, Wasserwirtschaft und Gewerbeaufsicht in Mainz.

Ist das Problem bekannt ? Letztes mal gab es neue dlls.

Mfg

Stefan Quittschalle  
s.a. PRB 22817  
  
Addition:   
A test has been done with the SQL Server ODBC driver and the SQL Server native Client 10.0 driver. The attachment 'empirum-fehler-odbc-v14-schrauben-jaeger.docx' shows different messages created bydifferent cpp modules (CComputerLeaf.cpp and FilterLeaf.cpp).  
The SQL Server was an 2008 Express edition. Mainly the filters 'Assigned computers', 'Not assigned computers' and 'Empirum Server' came up with the message. Partly there were extremely long wait times on opening filters on a database with just about 170 clients.  
Addition:  
image001.png with further module message attached

Problem.Subject: Einstellungen externe Programme werden nicht gespeichert. Sql Error: "Die gespeicherte Prozedur 'SaveUserSetting' wurde nicht gefunden.
Problem.description:
Hallo Kollegen,

Habe hier ein frisches v14sp1 komplett von dvd incl. Datenbank. Wenn ich versuche ein externes Programm anzulegen, klappt es nicht. Laut DebugView:

Sql Error: "Die gespeicherte Prozedur 'SaveUserSetting' wurde nicht gefunden."

Von meinem iPad gesendet

Best Regards

Thomas Hahn | Senior Consultant & Trainer | Matrix42
Office: +49.6102.816.0 | Fax: +49.6102.816.100 | Cell: +49.152.5799.3029 | thomas.hahn@matrix42.de
 

  

MBK: wenn ich es bei mir mache kommt folgendes:
[4736] CommonUI.lib: (CDbDispInterface::GetCurrentXMLContent) Found xml content 'Betriebssystem'
[4736] CommonUI.lib: (CDbDispInterface::ConvertUTF8ToAscii) Converted UTF-8 string 'Betriebssystem' into 'Betriebssystem'
[4736] CommonUI.lib: (CDbDispInterface::GetCurrentXMLAttribute) Found attribute 'Usage' with value '1'
[4736] CommonUI.lib: (CDbDispInterface::CheckUsage) iXMLUsageValue = 1, upUsage = 2048. Result 'false'
[4736] CommonUI.lib: (CDbDispInterface::GetCurrentXMLAttribute) Found attribute 'Usage' with value '1'
[4736] CommonUI.lib: (CDbDispInterface::CheckUsage) iXMLUsageValue = 1, upUsage = 2048. Result 'false'
[4736] SQL ERROR:  [Microsoft][ODBC SQL Server Driver][SQL Server]Could not find stored procedure 'SaveUserSetting'.
[4736] SQL Statement: {call SaveUserSetting(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)}
[4736] SQL ERROR:  [Microsoft][ODBC SQL Server Driver][SQL Server]Could not find stored procedure 'SaveUserSetting'.
[4736] SQL Statement: {call SaveUserSetting(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)}
gespeichert wird nichts 

testweise die Einstellung unter OS.ini gemacht, das wird gespeichert. 

### Nachgestellt von HAE: ### 

V14.1 

Man kann den Pfad anlegen, das Fenster schließen. Bei Wiederöffnen ist der Eintrag nicht mehr vorhanden. 

Mit der Administration.dll 14.1.0.388 funktionierte das noch!
Problem.Solution:
Bei der Lösung Bug 23011 (PRB22817) wurde den Kunden neu Adminisatrtion.dll und Inventory.dll geliefert. Inzwiesche wurde in der Bug 22238 (PRB22702) auch die Datenbank geändert. Dadurch entsehet diese Problem, dass neu Administartion.dll kann nicht mit Datenbank von DWD an manchen Stellen sprechen.
Bitte Administartion.dll aus PRB22817 und UserSetting.sql aus PRB22702 IMMER gemeinsam einspielen.

Problem.Subject: ErisLogonUI shows english text on german os
Problem.description:
Update "Sascha Bernhard"
 
Win7 Variable OS_Regionalsettings get not properly processed. For Example:
UILanguage_Win6x=de-DE
SystemLocale_Win6x=de-DE
UserLocale_Win6x=de-DE
InputLocale_Win6x=de-DE
 
The UserLocale_Win6x=de-DE dont set the Regkey correct.
The regkey is:
HKCU\Control Panel\International
"Locale"="0000409"
 
so the Regkey must be:
HKCU\Control Panal\International
"Locale"="0000407"
 
in Patch06 it still works, 
from patch07 it no longer works. (include Hotfix_15.1.0_20131113.2_PRB25873)
 
I can reproduce it on my VM

Problem.Subject: LIS update sometimes fails from clients - SOAP security negotiation
Problem.description:
Symptoms:
LIS update sometimes fails from clients 

Reproduction:
1. Open workspace "Licenses"
2. Start "License Intelligence Service"
3. Run "Update wizard". Wizard starts. 

Result:
After some seconds an error appears:
SOAP security negotiation with 
"http://lb01suite03:49101/LisSessionService/2010-05-12/" for target
"http://lb01suite03:49101/LisSessionService/2010-05-12/" failed 

Expected result:
No error appears. LIS file will be downloaded.
Problem.Solution:
For wizard works correct we need to configure SPN's on Domain Server.
On Domain Server (10.6.101.10) I was remove SPN ‘HOST/LB01SUITE03’ for LB01SUITE03 computer
and add SPN ‘HOST/LB01SUITE03’  for u4uService user. After that, wizard works, and the client receives correct Kerberos ticket as it is written in https://support.update4u.de/SPS/ServiceManager/Actions/KBViewer.aspx?KBArticle=dbdc6fe2-4b04-4d23-bdf3-c9eee1e1acc9&Style=Console

Problem.Subject: [FV-00796] FastViewer eigene Serverlösung / Kommunikation
Problem.description:
Guten Morgen,       

          

   wir haben den neuen FastViewer als Test im Einsatz. Wir haben eine eigene Serverkonfiguration gewhlt und nach Vorgaben der Dokumentation konfiguriert. Die Kommunikation luft ausschlielich ber https und tcp (443 und 5000).       

          

   Die Kommunikation des Remote Control Host wrde uns interessieren. Wie baut er die Verbindung auf? Die Datenbank auf dem FastViewer Server, kommuniziert diese auch mit den Servern von der Firma FastViewer? Wir haben Firewallseitig unsere VPN-Tunnel so konfiguriert das die eigentliche Kommunikation komplett intern verluft. Wir bekommen jedoch Parallel dazu Anfragen an unseren FastViewer Server in der DMZ von IP Adressen aus dem Internet. Daher die Frage dahin gehend ob die Datenbank auf unserem FastViewer Server noch mit der Firma FastViewer selber kommuniziert.       

          

   WIr haben zu dem die Problematik, dass manche Client keine Verbindung zum Server aufbauen knnen. Wir haben jedoch berall die gleiche Konfiguration installiert und verteilt. Bei vielen steht die Kommunikation nach wenigen Sekunden, bei manchen dauert es bis 5 Min und manche Verbinden sich berhaupt nicht. Diese Clients sind dann natrlich nicht erreichbar.       

          

   Vielen Dank fr Ihre Hilfe und Tips im voraus.       

          

   Mit freundlichen Gren   
   
Benjamin Dilbens   
Bereich Zentrales   
Gruppe EDV   
-391   
   
Verbraucherzentrale NRW   
Mintropstrae 27   
40215 Dsseldorf   
E-Mail: benjamin.dilbens@vz-nrw.de   
Web: www.vz-nrw.de
Problem.Solution:
Dies ist eine IP Adresse der Firma Verysign sie vergibt, Prüft, Sperrt SSL Zertifikate.
Das heißt jeder Dienst, Programm das SSL verwendet prüft bei einer bestehenden Internet Verbindung den Status seines Zertifikates.
Es hat demnach nichts mit dem Webconference Server zu tun.

Problem.Subject: Technical target will not be present in servicebookings, when technical target is provided by set, bundle, group
Problem.description:
Symptoms:  
If you define a set with technical "target required" and add some Service (which also Need a technical target), the technical target will not be provided to the related Service bookings.  
Prerequisites:  
Define 2 Services with technical target required (A,B)
Create a Set (S) with technical target required and add A,B with "technical target provided by set"  
Reproduction:    
go to Portal an order the new set  
check bookings  
Result:  
booking from set contain technical target
bookings from contained Services don't have a technical target.  
Expected Result:  
bookings from contained Services have a technical target.
Problem.Solution: 2014-10-20 ODR: successfully tested on BPM Main Continuous. Technical target is filled for the child bookings after approving.

Problem.Subject: Responsible Role won't change after changing the Category of Incident
Problem.description:

Responsible Role won't change after changing the Category of Incident

Two Categories, each with another responsible Role. Like "Service Desk" and "Service Catalog".

Create a new Incident and Choose "Service Desk" as category.
Save and Use action Edit.
Change category to "Service Catalog" and save.
Result:
Responsible Role gets unchanged.
Expected Result:
Responsible Role should depend on the set category.
Problem.Solution: 2014-11-03 ABA: Fixed in main

Problem.Subject: Wrong checkpoint calculation from actual installation
Problem.description:
Hallo Support Team, 

wir haben immer noch Probleme im Zuge der Buchungskreiserstellung -> siehe 
auch Ticket #99770. Das Ticket ist zwar bereits geschlossen, aber wir 
stehen bzgl. dieser Sachlage immer noch in Kontakt mit Herrn Semmler. 

Die "Nachtverarbeitung" nah der Buchungskreisanlage hat leider keine 
positiven Veränderungen gebracht.
Für die u. g. hohen Installationszahlen (18878), haben wir nun eine 
Vermutung (siehe Screenshots)
Desweiteren wurden selbsterstellte Softwareprodukte nicht kopiert.

Wir möchten Sie bitte, dass Thema intern zu besprechen und uns 
Lösungsmöglichkeiten aufzuzeigen.
Bitte geben Sie uns auch eine zeitliche Perspektive der nächsten Schritte.
Vielen Dank

*****

Am SOF37482 werden zwei verschiedene Werte für die Anzahl der 
Installationen ausgewiesen (siehe Screenshot). 
In der Vergangenheit (bzw. im Produktionssystem) stimmten diese Werte 
jedoch überein. 


Die Zahl "18878" setzt sich augenscheinlich aus der Summe aller zu diesem 
Softwareprodukt auflaufenden Fingerprints zusammen. 
Diese Zahlen wurde auch in der Vergangenheit ausgewiesen, aber bereits in 
diesem Schritt so weit konsolidiert, 
dass unter "Installationen (aktive Computer)" je Computer - auch bei 
mehreren Fingerprints - nur ein Fingerprint gezählt wurde.

Problem.Subject: Dotneterror and two Eris_UI Icons
Problem.description:
### <RGT> ###
 
Problem Description:
 
Two Tray Icons of Eris_UI.exe. This is a timing problem. If the user logs in very quickly this problem can appear. After a restart there is only one icon shown, and by clicking on the icon an errormessage appears (see attachment). After a while the second icons appears. Attached is also a video that shows the error.
If you wait a minute befor logon or set the Service ERIS.exe to “Automatic Delayed Restart” it works.
 
Product Information:
Eris 16.0.0.1656
VMClient Windows 7 and 8.1 64 Bit with SSD
 
Steps to reproduce:
Could not be reproduced by support.
 
Expected Result:
Eris_UI.exe Icon exists only one time.
 
Attachment:
Screenchot of Task Manager
ErrorMessage.png
AgentConfig.xml
Eris.exe_log.emplog
Video
Problem.Solution:
Hint for the customer (neo42 ?):

In the attached AgentTemplate the configuration of the user name can't be dissolved

    <Username>%Empirumserver%\Empdepot</Username>
The log file shows this entry:

  SMB Session Manager Error creating connection to \\FDN07\Configurator$\Packages with user W7X64DEU\. Errornr. : 
  2202. Der angegebene Benutzername ist unzulÃ¤ssig. ThreadID=8 (1712)

Solution:
Service ERIS.exe is now the only actor who starts an ERIS_UI.exe.
Run key with entry for ERIS_UI.exe isn't used anymore and is deleted.
ERIS_UI may be needed longer for starting up; tray icon is shown before the mouse events can pass to the program.

Hotfix has the Empirum Agent package of the comming Windows 10 Feature Pack and is not thoroughly tested yet. Version is 16.0.1.1700.

Problem.Subject: Inventory Data Providers use <hostname.FQDN> instead of actual DNS Name to address servers
Problem.description:
Symptoms:
To address a server the Windows Inventory Data Provider (as well as all other data providers) does not use the DNS name from the field "DNS Name", but uses the hostname and the FQDN of the domain instead.
In some infrastructures the DNS Name ist not only <hostname.FQDN> but can differ significantly. In such cases Windows Inventory (same goes for all other data providers) fails to connect identify the server.
Please review and correct this logic not only for Windows Data Provider but for the other inventory Data Providers, too.
Impact:
High.
Prerequisites:
Windows Inventory configured and running successfully
Reproduction:
Open Computer dialog of one of the successfully inventorised servers and go to dialog page "Identification"
Change domain entry to something else (create an internal domain with some fancy name if necessary)
Leave DNS Name unchanged save Computer record
Run Windows Inventory Data Provider

Result:
No Inventory because an incorrect DNS Name is used, which is put together by the hostname and the domain name.
2015-10-05 09:57:20 3 ERROR Error: InventoryConnectivityDataProvider (intern\lab700) - Unable to connect to the remote host 'lab700.intern' using WMI. The RPC server is unavailable. (Exception from HRESULT: 0x800706BA)
At C:\Program Files (x86)\Matrix42\Matrix42 Workplace Management\DataGateway\Host\Apps\Matrix42.DataGateway.Inventory\Extensions\Module\Matrix42.PowershellHelper.ps1:110 char:15
+     $result = Get-WmiObject @wmiparams
+               ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  CategoryInfo: InvalidOperation: (:) [Get-WmiObject], COMException  FullyQualifiedErrorId: GetWMICOMException,Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.GetWmiObjectCommand
Expected Result:
Windows Inventory uses DNS Name from the field "DNS Name" and successfully inventorises the server.
Workaround:
Create fake domain for the servers to be inventorised, to match the actual DNS name.
Problem.Solution: Name,DNS Name,IP Address are used during connection

Problem.Subject: Big line spaces in e-mails created by compliance rule
Problem.description:
Symptoms:
Big line spaces in e-mails created by compliance rule. After a new incident is created, the email created by compliance rule to confirm incident creation to affected user contains bigger line spaces than the original E-Mail text.
 
Prerequisites:
Exchange Server with Outlook Clients (2010 or 2016) for emailing.
Reproduction:
Create a new incident by sending an E-Mail to the Service Store E-Mail address
Check e-mail in Outlook (confirmation E-Mail to affected user)
Result:
The line breaks in the confirmation E-Mail are bigger than in original E-Mail text
 
Expected Result:
Line breaks should be the same as in the original E-Mail text
 
Attachments:
- "update4u.SPS.Utility.dll.config.zip" (config from user)
- "Attachments.zip" (original E-Mail and email confirmation E-Mail created by compliance rule)
 
Remarks:
Developer (Evgeniy Tveritinov) who worked on INQ (TFS ID 48082) has detailled information.
Problem.Solution:
20160216 AMA :  
The reason of such behavior is e-mail text processing before saving in ticket for security, more specifically  removing of <style> element from html formatted e-mail text (for security).
There is configuration file 'update4u.SPS.Utility.dll.config' describing allowed element and attributes. 
As workaround customer can edit that config file to preserve formatting.

For example, add 'style' exclusion in file 'update4u.SPS.Utility.dll.config' like :

<htmlSanitizer>
  <whiteList>
   <tags>
    <add name="style"/>
    <add name="html"/>

But it is insecured.

Problem.Subject: New History dialog creates an error if object has many history entries
Problem.description:
Symptoms: 
New History dialog creates an error if object has many history entries. If You choose a date which is more months ago or more than a year ago, an error occurs.
According to information from Ivan Vorobkalo this error has nothing to do with PRB28478.
 
Prerequisites:
Hotfix from Problem PRB28478 has to be installed
Computer Asset with many history entries must exist. Customer had a lot of history entries in last 2 years (more than 10 every day)
 
Reproduction:
Open the new history in an asset with many history entries and choose a date far away in the past (a year or two in the past)
Check the error message
 
Result: 
By choosing a date far in the past (a year) an orror occurs, see screenshot in attachment "Image001.png" and no data is shown
 
Expected Result:
No error should appear an data should be shown properly
 
Attachments:
Error message "Image001.png"
Logfiles "24.03.2016_keuro.zip"
Problem.Solution:
AKO: Fixed. Added paging for both old and new dialogs

Displaying history entries in paged grid (old-style dialog) or timeline with limited number of items in paging manner (new dialog).

Problem.Subject: SCCM imports wrong number of CPU sockets
Problem.description:
Symptoms:
Wrong number of CPU sockets after importing from SCCM.
Prerequisites:
Serverdata in SCCM.
Reproduction:
Run SCCM Import multiple times.
check amount of CPU sockets after each Import.
Result:
Wrong number of sockets is displayed.
Expected Result:
Correct number of sockets is imported, just like displayed in SCCM.
 
This bug is created as consequence of inquiry 'T125394 - SCCM Provider - wrong amount of CPU sockets'
We provided the attached XML file as data source for the GDIE 'SCCM / EM: Import CPU'. Before we started the GDIE, we've resetted the CPU Data for one asset with the following query:
delete from SPSComputerClassProcessor
where [Expression-ObjectID] in 
(select [Expression-ObjectID] 
from SPSComputerClassBase 
where Name like 'S415VM541')
After the 1st run 4 sockets were shown for the asset, after the 2nd run it were 8 and so on. After a short talk to AMA it seems like there is a Problem with the GDIE which was not changed by the customer.
Problem.Solution: GDIE sequence "SCCM / EM: Import CPU" was changed, matching changed & include Delete option

Problem.Subject: WakeOnLAN (WOL) service does not work with scheduler
Problem.description:
0.  Title
WakeOnLAN (WOL) service does not work with scheduler.
 
1.  Reproduced by:  JMT
2.  Affected version(s)
Empirum:        V16.1.0   & Hotfix_16.1.0_20160726.1_PRB28911
3.  Use case
Installing software with waking up computers by time.
4.  Impact for the customer
Software cannot be installed if wake up is needed in future.
5.  Reproduction
a.      Import the customer’s database.
a2. Install the WOL service in online mode.
b.      Go to configuration group ‘3. SDG\7. LAGERGERÄTE’.
c.       Open DebugView and log output of the WOL service.
d.      On the group use the activation dialog.
e.      Go to the second page and open the scheduler.
f.        Use action ‘One time’, set a time in future and close the dialog.
g.      Check the WOL box and confirm the activation.
h.      Check the DebugView log until the scheduled time is come. 
 
Actual Result:
No magic package is sent.
Expected Result:
Magic package are sent for all computers in the group.
6.  Workaround and Notes.
Workaround available: No
This behavior should be reproducible with all databases. However, it may depend on previous actions with or without WOL or if the service has been installed newly.
The described steps belong to the online service installation.
The offline installed service also does not work when setting the WOL time on the first activation page.

Problem.Subject: Close Change Activity Fails workflow with timeout exception
Problem.description:
Symptoms:
Close Change Activity Fails workflow with timeout exception. already 2 customer are reporting this issue.
When "close change" activity is executed, the workflow is one minute in state active and fails after this with

System.TimeoutException: Dieser an net.pipe://lab810.support.lab/M42Services/WF/ChangeManagement.EmergencyChange/ChangeManagement.EmergencyChange.svc/localControl gesendete Anforderungsvorgang hat innerhalb des konfigurierten Zeitlimits (00:01:00) keine Antwort empfangen. Der für diesen Vorgang zugewiesene Zeitraum war möglicherweise ein Teil eines längeren Timeouts. Mögliche Ursachen: Der Dienst verarbeitet den Vorgang noch, oder der Dienst konnte keine Antwortnachricht senden. Erwägen Sie, das Zeitlimit für den Vorgang zu erhöhen (indem Sie den Kanal/Proxy in IContextChannel umwandeln und die OperationTimeout-Eigenschaft festlegen), und stellen Sie sicher, dass der Dienst eine Verbindung mit dem Client herstellen kann.

Problem.Subject: Empirum Connector may does not finish, insert into SPSComputerclassLogon may run several hours
Problem.description:
Symptoms:
Currently 2 customer reporting that the empirum connector does not finish.
When you check the sql Activitymonitor we found this query running for several hours and maybe never finishes.
Because at the moment, I don't find any Empirum import staging logs on customer site. But i see that the start time sometimes changes.
Query:

INSERT INTO [dbo].[SPSComputerClassLogon]
    ([LogonDate]
    ,[LoggedAccount]
    ,[UsedInTypeSPSComputerType])
SELECT 
ccl0.[LogonDate]
,sacb.ID AS LoggedAccount
,ccb0._UsedInType AS UsedInTypeSPSComputerType
FROM [M42Staging].[dbo].[ComputerMatch] ccb0
INNER JOIN (
   [M42Staging].[dbo].[SPSComputerClassLogon] ccl0 
   INNER JOIN [dbo].[SPSAccountClassAD] AS saca ON [saca].[NBAccountName] = ccl0._NBAccountName COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT
  OR [saca].[NBAccountName] = (SUBSTRING(_NBAccountName, CHARINDEX('\', _NBAccountName)+1,LEN(_NBAccountName) - CHARINDEX('\', _NBAccountName))) COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT
   INNER JOIN [dbo].[SPSAccountClassBase] AS sacb ON saca.[Expression-ObjectID]=sacb.[Expression-ObjectID]
   INNER JOIN [dbo].[SPSADDomainClassBase] AS sdcb ON 
 [saca].[Domain] = [sdcb].[ID] 
    AND ( CHARINDEX('\', ccl0._NBAccountName) > 1 AND ([sdcb].[NT4Name] = SUBSTRING(ccl0._NBAccountName, 1 ,CHARINDEX('\', ccl0._NBAccountName)-1) COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT)
              OR ( CHARINDEX('\', ccl0._NBAccountName) =0 AND [sdcb].[NT4Name] = ccl0._Domain COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT )
  )
) ON ccb0._ClientId = ccl0._ClientId
LEFT JOIN [dbo].[SPSComputerClassLogon] ccl1
  ON ccb0._UsedInType=ccl1.UsedInTypeSPSComputerType AND sacb.ID = ccl1.[LoggedAccount] AND 
ccl0.[LogonDate] = ccl1.[LogonDate]
WHERE ccl1.Id IS NULL 
AND ccl0.[LogonDate] IS NOT NULL
AND EXISTS (
SELECT 1 
FROM [dbo].[SPSComputerType] ct
WHERE ct.ID = ccb0.[_UsedInType]
)
We uploaded the staging databases from both customers in our internal lab
10.5.10.51\customerdb
sa
Matrix42
or for direct server access use 
sup\admmatthiasb
pw: admmatthiasb
Prerequisites:
customer environment
Reproduction:
start empirum connector
Result:
Empirum connector has a huge runtime and seems to be stucked on mentioned query
Expected Result:
Query shoud be optimized.

Problem.Subject: Unwanted software activation after adding and deleting of a package to a configuration group
Problem.description:
1. Reproduced by  MHN
2. Affected Version(s)
16.1.1
3. Use case
Adding and deleting of Software on Group Level. After this procedure, the ddc will be updated with the new package automaticly, without Manual activation.
Unwanted installations start.
4. Impact for the customer (description)
 Software will be activated automaticly. Unwanted installations start immediantly.
5. Reproduction
Add any package to a activated configuration group
Delete any package from this Group (i.e. Highlight the package and hit the Del key)

Result:
The ddc file will be automaticly updated, the new added package is written into the ddc file without a manually activation.
In former Versions i.e. 16.0 only the deleted package was also deleted from the ddc file. To enter the new added package to the ddc file, a manual activation was neccessary.
Problem.Solution: Gefixt in Main/16.1.2, HF für 16.1.1 folgt sobald das LTSB da ist

Problem.Subject: Software Inventory is not updated by Connectors
Problem.description:
This behaviour was reported by a customer with SCCM and can be reproduced with Empirum. It is therefore not related to any specific connector but to the Asset Mgt module.  
Symptoms:  
Update after solution: this behaviour is not necessarily limited to the use case that inventorised software is update to another version. Issues with not updated software inventory in general are solved with the fix for this PRB. So far 2 customers have confirmed the solution of their issue with the hotfix for this PRB. In both cases the scenario differed from this PRB description.  
Inventory does not recognise changes to installed software untilthe computeris deleted and reimported into Service Store. These changes can be an update of the software to a newer version or uninstalling the software. Inv. Applications still lists the old SW version although the CLM application (Empirum, SCCM or whatever is used) already contains the updated inventory. As a result of this issue leads to wrong numbers in License Management!  
Prerequisites:    
Empirum or SCCM environment with active connector in Service Store (the reproductions steps assume we are using Empirum. For SCCM just perform the equivalent steps)  
A test client running any software e.g. Mozilla Firefox in an older version (< 12 - for simplicity let's assume we are using Firefox 9)  
Reproduction:    
Part A    
Install Empirum Inventory on test client and run it  
Check inventory in Empirum and make sure Firefox 9 is listed under "Software"  
In Service Store console run Empirum Connector   
Go to Assets > Computers and open dialog of test client > Inv. Applications and check if Mozilla Firefox 9 is listed in Inv. Applications  
On test client update Firefox to current version (at the time this PRB was created it is/was version 12)  
Run inventory again and check in Empirum if Firefox 12 was found on client  
In Service Store console run Empirum Connector  
Run LCM data processing  
Go to Assets > Computers and open dialog of test client > Inv. Applications and check version of Mozilla Firefox    

Part B    
In console go to Assets > Computers and delete test client  
Run Empirum Connector  
Run LCM data processing  
In Assets > Computers open dialog of reimported test client and go to Inv. Applications  
  
Result:    
Part A    
Inv. Applications still lists Firefox 9 (not OK)  
Licences > Installations (filter by test client) does not list any Firefox installation (not OK)  
Test client has no License Requirement for Firefox (not OK)    
Part B    
Inv. Applications lists Firefox 12 (OK)  
Licenses > Installations (filter by test client) lists Firefox 12 (OK)  
Test client has License Requirement for Firefox 12 (OK)  
  
Expected Result:  
After Part A Inv. Applications must list Firefox 12. Or in other words: Asset must contain updated inventory without having to delete and reimport the whole asset.

Problem.Subject: Installation records are removed because Empirum Connector sometimes imports application inventory with attribute "Installed=0"
Problem.description:
Symptoms: 
Installation records are removed because Empirum Connector sometimes imports application inventory with attribute "Installed=0". Thereafter the LCM data processing removes the related installation records because it looks like the application has been uninstalled from the client. It seems the attibute "Installed" is not always set to "0", so that the installation appears again in Service Store and gets removed again next time this misbehaviour occurs. This behaviour seems to occur mostly for OS detection.

n/a

n/a

n/a

n/a

Issue identified and classified by VKH during a remote session in customer environment

Problem.Subject: SPSAssetClassBase.InventoryNumber will be updated via empirum connector every time
Problem.description:
Symptoms:  
SPSAssetClassBase.InventoryNumber will be updated via empirum connector every time:
in the past we only updated this Attribute on the first update. Because normaly an inventory number does not change anymore.
Since Patch 2, inventory number will always be updated. This can be a problem for customer, who does not manage the inventory number over empirum.  
TBO thinks this is a side effect of one of the last changes you did on Empirum Connector.
Please check the dependecies and rollback the change with SPSAssetClassBase.InventoryNumber  
Prerequisites:  
-  
Reproduction:    
Import a computer  
change inventory number in empirum  
Import again  
Result:  
inventory number is updated again  
Expected Result:  
Inventory should not been updated after the first change.
There are customer who asking for an Inventorynumber update and there are customers who does not want this.

If you cando it, maybe insert a new Option to empirum connector Location configuration to switch inventorynumber update mode on /off.  
If you can't do something like this just restore the old functionality, customer who want an inventorynumber update can still implement a custom GDI Import.
Problem.Solution:
Hints for QA restest:
New option in Empirum connector setting is available, test both possibilities
Change Inventory number of computers in Empirum with following statment:
UPDATE InvComputer
Set InventoryID = 'abcd'
WHERE Computername LIKE '<COMPUTER>'

Before starting Empirum import, execute following statment on M42STORE/M42PRODUCTION:
UPDATE SPSInventoryClassBase
SET LastScanDate = NULL, LastImportDate = NULL




Not reproduceable. I would advise to test the feauture together.
===
2013-12-20 RLE: test failed on Main DistributionBuild 7.0.0.1199 20131219 1339..1
1. configure and import emp comp
2. checkbox "Update Inventory Number" checked
3. change Inventory Number of any comp
4. restart import
5. check inv nr

result:
nothing happens
emp import ignors all Inventories

New checkbox added to location settings, which defines whether inventory numbers are updated or not.

Problem.Subject: Community-Drivere are integrated in the .ini files despite being deactivated
Problem.description:
1. Detailed Problem Description:  
Driver wizardoffers Community Driver for Download although the feature is not activated and writes them as an driver entry in the corresponding .ini files  
2. Affected Product, File Versions:  
all V14 branches  
3. Steps to Reproduce:  
Attached is a spy file from a computer that has two graphics drivers
Start wizard with this spy file  
4. Actual Result:  
see screenshot:  
  
this is the Community driver. This driver gets not shown in the driver list but when I feed a spyfile it gets downloaded instead of theMX driver that is also available.  
Furthermore, it is then selected as the active Driver during the installation of an OS.  
5. Anticipated Result:  
If the option 'use community drivers' is not set community drivers must not be downloaded in any way.
Instead the wizard should either offer the MX driver if available and Use it in the OS Installation processor it should offer the option to integrate a new driver.  
6. Possible Error Reason:  
wizard ignores setting of the option 'use community drivers' and as a resulting error writes them in the ini files  
7. Attachments:  
screenshot
spy file for replication of this error.

Problem.Subject: Adv. Agent: iperf.exe causes 100% cpu usage on clients if iperf service is stopped on the assigned depot server
Problem.description:
Problem description
==============  
1. Reproduced by fgs  
2. Affected version
15.0
15.1  
3. Use case
If bandwidth limit is set to a value less than 100% in an agent template, the agent performs an iperf measurement before downloading package data. When the iperf service does not run on the depotserver, the iperf.exe on the clientcauses 100% cpu usage.  
4. Impact for the customer (description)
It is not possible to work on client computers because of high cpu usage through iperf  
5. Reproduction
Configure agent template with bandwith limit (e.g. 50%)
Stop iperf service on the empirum server
Assign template to a client computer
Assign a new package to the client computer (e.g. Helios Textpad)
Force polling (or wait for next regular polling)
Check cpu usage  
  
6. Workaround
Available: yes
Set bandwidth limit to 100%
Problem.Solution:
###fgs 20140522###
Fixed with hotfix for 15.1

Problem.Subject: Driver download does not remove selection checkmark after execution
Problem.description:
0.  Title
Driver download does not remove selection checkmark after execution.
 
1.  Reproduced by:  JMT
2.  Affected version(s)
Empirum:        V16
3.  Use case
The customer wants to update drivers.  
4.  Impact for the customer
Unreliable driver download if previous selected driver are downloaded again or in newer versions which are not desired.
5.  Reproduction
a.      Open the EMC and select Configuration.
b.      Select ‘OS Installer’ and go to ‘Hardware/Driver Administration’.
c.       Select a driver and use menu ‘Tools/Download drivers’.
d.      Select all operating systems for the driver and select option ‘Delete selection’.
e.      Start the download and wait until the status of the driver is ‘UpToDate’.
 
Actual Result:
The checkmark is not deselected. 
Expected Result:
The checkmark is deselected.
6.  Workaround and Notes.
Workaround available: No
 
7.  Resources
Problem.Solution: Bug fixed

Problem.Subject: Installation of package with scheduled time starts before.
Problem.description:
#### Reproduced by <RGT> ####  
  
Problem Description:  
  
Scheduler Settings are partially ignored by Advanced Agent.A package with SchedulerSettings(see attachment) is executed at the correct day,but not at the correct time.  
@20.02.2014 see also attached .doc, monthly installation doesn´t work also  
  
Product information:  
15.1 Patch 6 with Hotfix PRB26052, SchedulerCheck.dll 15.1.0.951  
Remark: Similar Problem was already fixed with PRB24668  
  
  
Steps to reproduce:  
Install a Software Package on a TestClient withsimilarScheduler Settings.   
  
  
  
Expected Result:  
The Package is installed on the set day but not before 12:00 o´clock  
  
Actual Result:  
The installation starts everyFriday , so far correct. But the time is ignored. It installation starts immediately after the Client is switched on.   
  
Possible Error Reason:  
Advanced Agent ignores scheduler settings.

Problem.Subject: Account für Treiber Community kann nicht angelegt werden
Problem.description:
1. Detaillierte Beschreibung des Problems: 

die Treiber-Community scheint nicht funktionsfähig. Gibt es dort noch Schwierigkeiten? 

  

Der Assistent bricht mit folgender Meldung ab: 

 

  

Versuch mit anderen Namen ist erfolglos! 

  

2. Produktinformationen, Dateiversionen: 

EMC aus E V14 P02 

  

3. Schritte zum Reproduzieren: 

- Erst alle Updateschritte auf V14 P02 durchführen, Rechner neustarten. 

- Treibercommunity im DBUtil aktivieren 

- Account über die EMC anlegen 

  

4. Tatsächliches Ergebnis: 

Es kommt eine diffuse Fehlermeldung es könne kein Account angelegt werden und man solle einen anderen Namen versuchen 

  

5. Erwartetes Ergebnis: 

Account kann angelegt werden 

Kann der Account nicht angelegt werden wäre eine aussagekräftige Fehlermeldung warum das nicht geht sehr hilfreich. 

  

6. Mögliche Fehlerursache: 

Im DebugView ist leider nichts zu sehen. 

  

7. Anlagen: 

Screenshots 

DebugView- Log.
Problem.Solution:
Servereinstellung wurde vorgenommen. Jetzt wird ein anderer Mail-Server verwendet, der die Mails durchlässt.
Test mit meinem gmx-Account war erfolgreich.

Problem.Subject: GDIE import sequences from web sources fail during staging
Problem.description:
Symptoms:
after update to 5.31.0852 some GDIE imports no longer work. This issue is related to this imports from files located in the web (or which have some web URLs). 


Prerequisites:
Customer environment. 


Reproduction:
Create import definition as seen in screenshot 

Import source is a web-URL 


Result:
import fails during staging 


Expected Result:
import should run 

  

Further informations:
Customer is escalated. They have serious 5.31 update issues and plan to buy 200 more licences!
Problem.Solution:
Import failed because customer has source values larger than column lenght in database. Now we check it and skip wrong rows.

Fixed synchronization between readers

Problem.Subject: Verschieben von Clients per Drag+Drop geht nicht mehr
Problem.description:
1. Detaillierte Beschreibung des Problems: 

In früheren Empirum- Version konnte man Clients die nicht aktiviert waren per Drag+Drop von einer in eine andere Konfiggruppe verschieben. Das geht nicht mehr. 

2. Produktinformationen, Dateiversionen: 

Administration.dll 14.0.2.3134 

3. Schritte zum Reproduzieren: 

Client deaktivieren (os.ini, pxe und Softwareverteilung) 

Dann den Client bzw. dessen Konfigurationsgruppe in eine andere Konfigurationsgruppe verschieben 

4. Tatsächliches Ergebnis: 

Wird die Gruppe verschoben, dann wird in der anderen Gruppe eine Kopie der Gruppe samt zugewiesener Elemente erstellt
Wird der Client verschoben kommt die Fehlermeldung daß der Client schon in einer Gruppe sei 

Zudem stürzt die EMC beim Verschieben von Gruppen häufig ab! 

5. Erwartetes Ergebnis: 

Verschieben von Gruppen oder Clients sollte wieder möglich sein.
Fürs Kopieren gibt es den Punkt im Kontextmenü unter Bearbeiten! 

6. Mögliche Fehlerursache: 

Bug. 

7. Anlagen: 

Screenshot mit kopierter Gruppe und unverständlicher Fehlermeldung.
Problem.Solution:
Problem kam durch Bugfix 5033 ("EMC - ADM > Falsches Verhalten bei Drag & Drop eines Computers") am 26.11.2010 in die Administration.dll hinein.

Jetzt Verhalten so geändert, dass innerhalb der Konfigurationsgruppen nur gedroppt wird - in jeder anderen Konstellation (z.B. Zuweisungsgruppe -> Zuweisungsgruppe, Zuweisungsgruppe -> Konfigurationsgruppe, Konfigurationsgruppe -> Zuweisungsgruppe, linker Baum in mittleren Baum, rechter Baum in mittleren Baum, etc.) nur gepastet wird. Sollte so jetzt wie gewünscht funktionieren.

Für die Kundenversion (v14 Patch 2) müsste die Administration.dll ausgetauscht werden (14.0.2.3181 oder höher).

Problem.Subject: DBUtil stürzt ab / friert ein
Problem.description:
DBUtil stürzt ab /friert ein..  

Sehe ich mir mit frischem DB Dump an. Fehler war unter Aufsicht von VDI vorgeführt. 

Mittlerweile sammele ich die Calls und DBUtil sürzt bei allen möglichen Änderungen ab. 

##### Reproduziert v. <KFX> ##### 

Fehlerbeschreibung: 

DBUtil stürzt beim ändern des Diensteserverpasswort ab. 

(siehe Störungen im Anhang) 

Reproduziert mit DBUtil.exe Version V14 P2 

Schritte zum Reproduzieren: 

Tritt auf aber lässt sich nicht so einfach reproduzieren. 

Evl DB des Kunden zum testen verwenden.  

Tatsächliches Ergebnis: 

DBUtil sürtzt sporadisch bei folgenden Aktionen ab: 

Dienste Passwort ändern 

Installationeinstellung eintragen 

Diensteserver Information eintragen  

Erwartetes Ergebnis: 

Keine Abstürze 

 Fehlerursache: 

Im DebugView keine Fehler ersichtlich
Problem.Solution:
Das Problem lässt sich nicht reproduzieren. 
Laut Kundenaussagen scheint aber das Problem eine Facette des bereits geschlossenen Bugs 5481 zu sein.
Der Test beim Heraeus hat diese Vermutung gestärkt.

Das Problem wurde nur in V14 SP2 Branch behoben. In anderen Branches wurde es frühe gemacht.


Die neue DBUtil muss von Alpha genommen werden.

Problem.Subject: Software Push works sometimes not properly, package will only be downloaded
Problem.description:
1. Detailed Problem Descrition:  
Apushed software package will be only downloaded without that the installation starts.
The second push works, because the package exists in the cache.  
2. Affected Product, File Versions:  
15.1 Patch03 ERIS.exe 15.1.0.778  
3. Steps to Reproduce:
Create an agent template with the setting "Install after Download".
Check that the package is not already in the cache folder .  
Push a software package to a WIN7 or WIN8 Client  
4. Actual Result:
Sometimes the package will only be downloaded, but the installation never starts.
If the push will be executed the second time, after the download the package will be installed  
5. Anticipated Result:
Package will be downloaded and the installation starts immediately  
6. Possible Error Reason:  
If the package is already in the cache, the installation starts.
The check if the package download is finish is executed to early.  
7. Attachments:  
SWdepotLogPush.jpg Screenshot of the SWdepotlog
Helios_dl_W8_64.LOG DebugViewLog Only downloaded, no installation
HeliosPush_EMPSVR2008.LOG DebugViewlog of the activation service with a recorded push
Adobe_W8_64.LOGDebugViewlog Push with installation
AgentConfig.xml  
@01.10.2013 RGT  
Nach Deinstallation eines SW-Pakets, funktioniert der anschliesssende Push des selben nicht. Download des SW-Pakets wird zwar durchgeführt, dann passiert aber nichts mehr.
Kann es sich dabei um das selbe Problem wie in unserem bestehenden Ticket "T77138 Reinstall per push funktioniert nicht" handelt? 
Dazu gibt es ja auch schon einen Thread im M42 User forum http://www.matrix42.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=9&t=12449&p=50423&hilit=push+pull&sid=6fddfdc158372b2decb9447e17473672#p50423

Problem.Subject: Incremental LIS Update results in GDIE exception
Problem.description:
Symptoms:
Incremental LIS Update results in GDIE exception. Every customer is affected. It seems that the LIS data is inconsistent and tries to add Software Products to suite definitions before the software products are in the customer's system.  
Prerequisites:
None  
Reproduction:  
Perform incremental LIS online update  
Result:
GDIE exception. The import logs refer to definitions of MSDN suites. Example:  
Relation 'Softwareproduktvorlage.In der Suite enthalten' - no match (criteria: [98bf50d4-aa92-43cc-87a6-00cc3175e3b7]; error code: 0)
  
AddDate:[5/1/2006 12:00:00 AM]; ChangeDate:[6/25/2013 12:13:40 PM]; SuiteSoftware_ID:[8756ca73-90a0-4f16-b128-427d8e99582e]; SuiteSoftware_Name:[MSDN Operating Systems]; SuiteSoftware_PID:[PID118906]; MemberSoftware_ID:[98bf50d4-aa92-43cc-87a6-00cc3175e3b7];  
Expected Result:
Incremental LIS Update should run without errors.
Problem.Solution:
2013-11-08 RLE:
successfully tested @ 6.0.3.1190
created .csv roles with new roles and persons
created new import definition and imported .csv

OPO: update SP on lis prod. server that is used to get software products that was changed during last update.
Now, SP will get soft that meet conditions and also all related soft (that are members of suite or are suites for this soft.) 

OPO: Updated software in LIS db, that is missing on customer.
Also TBO updated LIS tool and stored procedures used to get data for LIS update.
ANO: 10/4/2013 Fixed. Verified.

Problem.Subject: Counter for Object IDs counts up on the wrong digit
Problem.description:
Symptoms  
-          Object ID’s for (at least) incidents and licenses are derived in a wrong way. The mechanism to create the next available ID adds to the wrong digit. This behaviour has been observered in the Matrix42 Presales Demo environment. Support was unable to reproduce this in test lab and so far there are no other known cases. Please assist in this case, because Presales demos our product to potential customers with this environment!  
-          Example:   
o   last created incident is INC00039  
o   system creates next ID like INC10039, but should go for INC00040  
   
System  
-          
-          WPM 2013 Build 6.0.0.1155 (Patch 1)  
   
Reproduction    
  

-          Go to Service Desk  
  

-          Create new Incident from Quick Start (other ways also affected)  
  

-          Check ticket ID  
  

-          Uncheck some of them  
   
Result  
-          Object ID adds value to first digit  
   
Expected  
-          Should create the next numeric value  
   
More  
-          Also observed with license records in build 1115, but not in 1155   
-          See attached logs (Build 1155) and screenshots
Problem.Solution: MAS: This is a duplicate of PRB26656 and of T97755.

Problem.Subject: E-Mail Robot imports some mails from IMAP4 mailbox into ticket Journal with "empty email message" instead of text from mail body
Problem.description:
Symptoms:
analog to the issue reported in PRB23584 one customer experiences similar behaviour which affects not only the ticket description, but also the Journal:  
E-Mail robot processes all mails but some of the mails are not imported correctly into the Journal. Subject and recipients are displayed correcty, but instead of the actual message only the "empty email message" is displayed in the Journal. THis happens with html-formatted E-Mails only, but not with all of them.  
Prerequisites:
Affected customer uses a Cyrus IMAP4 v2.1.18-IPv6-Debian-2.1.18-1 server
E-Mail Robot is configured as IMAP4 without SSL  

Reproduction:    
Create Incidents with ticket numbers corresponding to the ticket numbers in the subject lines of the attached E-Mails (alternative: change the ticket numbers in the subject lines of the attached mails to ticket numbers that correspond to existing Incidents)  
Configure E-Mail Robot to access this mailbox, using type=IMAP4 and non-SSL connection, ticket type="Incident"  
Import the attached E-Mail messages into mailbox on mail server of the above type  
Wait for E-Mail Robot to run and check the Journal of the relevant Incidents  

Result:  
Text in mail body is not displayed in Journal. Instead it only says: "empty email message"  

Expected Result:  
Text in mailbody should be displayed correctly.  

Further informations:  
This issue has so far only been reported by one customer and has not been reproduced by support. According to VSH this issue is not in the scope of PRB23584. PRB23584 covers only the creation of new tickets, while this PRB is about updating existing tickets. Since the issues might be technically unrelated please do not close this PRB as a duplicate, before you can proof otherwise.

Problem.Subject: LIS Update fails with SOAP error when started from a client
Problem.description:
Symptoms:  
LIS Update fails with SOAP Error when started from a client. if you start from the server, LIS Update tool works.
This problem is not 100% reproduceable but in our testenvoirment we got similar problem like the customers.  
Prerequisites:  
-  
Reproduction:    
start LIS Update from a client  
Result:  
LIS Update fails direct after start:
Customer example
"Application configuration:
Version - 2.0.50727.5448
Account name - LANDRATSAMT\wiedemannbe
LIS Update server URL - https://support.update4u.de/
Matrix42 Service Store URL - http://SRVM42S01.landratsamt.de:49101/

Error details:

Possible solution:
Fehler bei der SOAP-Sicherheitsaushandlung mit "http://srvm42s01.landratsamt.de:49101/LisSessionService/2010-05-12/" für Ziel "http://srvm42s01.landratsamt.de:49101/LisSessionService/2010-05-12/". Weitere Details finden Sie unter der inneren Ausnahme."  
Expected Result:  
LIS Update works.
I attached logs from the extra utility.

We already investigated this problem with Alexandr Mrysnky. Please forward to him:
  
Currently there are two assumptions:  
  
1. It could be related to the breaking change in .NET 3.5 SP1. No idea why it appeared only now, because it was released 3 years ago.  
  
The text from the release notes http://www.google.com/url?sa=tamp;rct=jamp;q=amp;esrc=samp;frm=1amp;source=webamp;cd=1amp;ved=0CCAQFjAAamp;url=http%3A%2F%2Fdownload.microsoft.com%2Fdownload%2Fa%2F2%2F8%2Fa2807f78-c861-4b66-9b31-9205c3f22252%2Fdotnet35sp1readme.htmamp;ei=lJM7T4v_CYqS-wa62t2sBwamp;usg=AFQjCNEDU7WWfq4qyFvb3eGWHOw5NuLQkg :  
2.3.2.2 Breaking changes in the SspiNegotiatedOverTransport authentication mode  
  
When WSHttpBinding, WS2007HttpBinding, or NetTcpBinding is used with SecurityMode = TransportWithMessageCredential and a client credential type of Windows, clients that previously authenticated to a service by using NTLM will now fail to authenticate, with the following error:   
"System.ComponentModel.Win32Exception: Security Support Provider Interface (SSPI) authentication failed. The server may not be running in an account with identity 'host/<hostname>'. If the server is running in a service account (Network Service for example), specify the account's ServicePrincipalName as the identity in the EndpointAddress for the server. If the server is running in a user account, specify the account's UserPrincipalName as the identity in the EndpointAddress for the server."   
The error appears when the service is running on an account that has an identity other than 'host/<hostname>'. This issue also applies to CustomBindings, which specify the SspiNegotiatedOverTransport authentication mode.  
  
2. Some changes in Kerberos settings for the service account breaks authentication.  
  
Similar problem with explanation http://www.identitychaos.com/2011/02/soap-security-negotiation-with.html http://www.identitychaos.com/2011/02/soap-security-negotiation-with.html

Problem.Subject: Processor count leads to wrong amount of processors from virtual machines
Problem.description:
Symptoms:  
At the Moment the empirum connector Counts the amount of processors with a simple Statement on DMI Information.
(
SELECT * , row_number() over (partition by _ClientId order by CPUSocket) dmiNr,
COUNT(*) over (partition by _ClientId) SocketCount,
SUM(CASE WHEN CPUStatus='Enabled' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) over (partition by _ClientId) ProcessorCount
FROM DMIProcessorInformation
)  
This work mostly well but on virtual machines, like vmware, DMI informations aresimply not correct.
Each Coreofthe VMis an entry in DMI table with CPUStatus='Enabled'.
You will find 2 examples (virtual and physical machine in the attachments, example.pdf, please ignore the german text.)  
With this the Service store license Management calculate license requirement with a wrong amount of processors.  
Prerequisites:  
Virtual Client in empirum with at least 2 processors  
Reproduction:    
Import from empirum  
check inv. specification  
Result:  
for virtual Computers the processor Count is wrong.  
Expected Result:  
Correct amount of processors will be displayed.   
To reach this Goal, I spoke already with PM(TBO and CHA)and we decided that the best way before an detailed logic is simpy  
IF WMI is not empty
(Count WMI)
else
(Count DMI)  
We are doing something like that already for cores.  
Important note:
We want to test this Change on some customer Environments before applying this to mainbuild.  
Please create an hotfix and MBK will take over the testing process, don't apply the changed to mainBuild till we confirm the hotfix.
Problem.Solution: fixed
