Since the update to 8.0.2 not count in currentcycle does not increase and the lastrundate does not change. Even when all activation are activated planned.
Prerequisites:
update to 8.0.2
maybe: SQL 2014
Reproduction:
check values in engine activations
wait one day
check again
Result:
Lastrun and counter will not increase.
In Schedulerlog, there are many errors like this:
2015-10-19 22:00:00,028 ERROR 32 HostScheduler (null) (null) (null)  (null) 8.0.2   - System.InvalidOperationException: ExecuteNonQuery requires the command to have a transaction when the connection assigned to the command is in a pending local transaction.  The Transaction property of the command has not been initialized.
   at System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ValidateCommand(String method, Boolean async)
   at System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.InternalExecuteNonQuery(TaskCompletionSource`1 completion, String methodName, Boolean sendToPipe, Int32 timeout, Boolean asyncWrite)
   at System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteNonQuery()
   at update4u.SPS.Engines.Activation.ActivationAdapter.IncrementLifeCycle(ScheduleDefinition definition, DateTime runTime)
   at update4u.SPS.Engines.Repository.Scheduler.SchedulerController.PooledCall(Object state)
Expected Result:
Lastrun and counter should increase.
attachments:
Logs and Screenshot.
Problem.Solution:
Checked in mainbuild  BPM Main Continuous 8.1.0.1589 201600301 1136.1.
LastRun and Current Cycle are refreshed, no error in scheduler.log anymore.

Problem.Subject: General Problem with Windows 10 SKUs due to MS new dynamic Name convention starting with Build 10586.
Problem.description:
1. Reproduced by AGL in customer and hin own Environment. 
 
2. Affected Version(s)
16.0.2+
 
3. Use case
General Problem with Windows 10 SKUs due to MS new dynamic Name convention starting with Build 10586.
Issue starts with the nuew Windows 10 release  -> V1511 Bild 10586, the new SKU Model contains more info than  just the edition type and architecture. From now the SKU contains Version/release No. and/or Build No. and in case of Volume Licenses the license type. Therefore the Installation stops on the SKU Selection Menu and a fully automated Installation is impossible. Every new release or Build will get a new SKU. 
 
4. Impact for the customer (description)  
All Customers that are intend to use Windows 10.
 
5. Reproduction
Install Windows 10 via Empirum using thew new Build (10586).
 
6. Workaround
Available: no
Problem.Solution: Fixed with Update 03

Problem.Subject: Airwatch DP "MDM: Import Device Applications" - ambiguous match caused by upper and lower case of app name
Problem.description:
Symptoms:
MWM Airwatch Data Provider may fail on import "Import Device Applications" due to failure of identifying duplicate apps, one spelt with upper case, the other with lower case.
The activity for the PackageItemGenerator uses a hash table to identify doubles, the hash table is created case sensitive, therefore the app is not discovered as a duplicate.
Example:
Extract from Mobile Device Apps.xml:
<object>
 <Key>"Feedly""com.devhd.feedly""31.0.0"</Key>
 <DeviceId>51</DeviceId>
</object>
and
<object>
 <Key>"feedly""com.devhd.feedly""31.0.0"</Key>
 <DeviceId>342</DeviceId>
</object>
These are then imported as 2 separate fingerprints in Service Store, one as "Feedly 31.0.0" and the other as "feedly 31.0.0". When the MWM Airwatch Data Provider runs again, "MDM: Import Device Applications" will fail due to an ambiguous match, referring to the above fingerprint.
This issue has already been analysed and diagnosed by development and the malicious code already identified. 

Impact:
Medium. This is the last of 8 import sequences of the Airwatch Data Provider. All other relevant information will have already been imported, when this issue occurs.
Prerequisites:
Issue is difficult to reproduce under lab conditions. It is suggested to skip the reproduction because this issue is already diagnosed and the malicious code found.
Reproduction:
n/a
Result:
n/a
Expected Result:
n/a
Workaround:
None
Problem.Solution:
The Workflow "MDM AirWatch Connector" was changed. 
Added new NonSQL Activity for removing of duplicates of Fingerprints.

Problem.Subject: VMWare Inventory Provider dont work proper on multi-vSphere environments
Problem.description:
This is a very specific issue, and I guess this is not the kind of VMware setup we will see often in a productive environment. However, we have a customer with 2 vSphere environments. there setup looks like that:
vCenter01:
iresx01, vmhostid= HostSystem-host-27
iresx02, vmhostid= HostSystem-host-28 
iresx03, vmhostid= HostSystem-host-09
vCenter02:
iresx08, vmhostid= HostSystem-host-09
every vCenter has its own entry in the VMWare inventory provider configuration. Every vCenter generates a hostID for each host it manages. Both of the vCenters are independed. So it could happen that there are hosts on both environments with the identical ID (see the bold lines). actually this happend by one of our customers. The Problem is, it seems to be the matching criteria and that leads to overwritten host server objects in the service store.
Problem.Solution: ALY: matching had been corrected.

Problem.Subject: "Inform Responsible[...]" CoRu won't send mail if userrole has an email adress
Problem.description:
Symptoms:
CoRu won't send email to responsible role if the role has an email address configured.
Prerequisites:
CoRu to inform responsible role after creation of a Task.
Reproduction:
Enter email adress for the role
create task
wait for coru to trigger
check sent mails.
remove email address from role and repeat step 2 to 4
Result:
On step 4 there has no mail been sent; after removing the email address it is.
Expected Result:
In both cases an email should have been sent. But to different receipients.
 
The following ASQL Query was used as dynamic receipient:
SUBQUERY(SPSActivityClassBase AS A, A.RecipientRole.[Expression-ObjectID], A.ID = base.RelatedSPSActivityClassBase.ID AND A.NotifyResponsible = 1 AND A.Recipient IS NULL)
Please check the attached video which shows the behavior.
 Further Information: At first the emails have benn sent, but since I once changed the processing from 'Only process the last compliance rule event per object within the processing period' to 'Process each compliance rule Event for eacht object' it never worked again. No matter which option I selected. This information might be helpfull to recreate the issue.
After a short talk to Fabian he told me that in both cases an email should be sent, but with a configured email address for the role the email should be sent to this, not to each member of the role.
Problem.Solution: Tested

Problem.Subject: Printing of a report ends in error: unable to load client print control
Problem.description:
Description: 

If you try to print a report it appears a error message "Unable to load client print control". The ActiveX-Control of the reportserver will not be installed, if it is missing on the host.
But if you connect to the reportserver itself, opens the report and tries to print, the ActiveX-Control can be installed. 

Precondition: 

The IE Add-On "RSClient Print Class 2005" is not installed for the IE 

Steps to Reproduce:  
Open a Report 
Click on the print symbol 
Affirm the error 
Open a new IE Windows and connect to report server: http://NameOfServer/reportserver 
Open a Report in the IE 
Click on print symbol 

Result: 

The Add-On "RSClient Print Class <Version>" is not checked for installation in the Store. If you open the report over the reportserver, you will be asked to install the missing Add-On and after installation, you can print the report. If you opens the IE again and tries to print a report over the Store, you get the error message again! But you can print the report everytime on the reportserver itself! 

Expected Result: 

Also in the Service Store, a click on the print symbol has to ask for Installation of the missing Add-On. Also, if the Control is installed, the Store has to load it and print the report without any error messaged!

Problem.description:
<<<Übersicht Meldungen - bitte pflegen bei neuen Erkenntnissen!>>>

Self Service Portal Bereich Support
-----------------------------------------
(a) Bei Erstellen eines neuen Tickets können Kategorien nicht gelesen werden (zuviele Spalten dargestellt)
> Letzter Status: Problem T17906

(b) Default-Werte werden nicht gesetzt, wenn die Category geändert wird
> Letzter Status: Arbeitsweise erklärt, ist akzeptiert.

(c) Anzeige Incident Details schneidet Infos ab: im Screenshot ist dies bei dem Feld Responsible gut zu sehen, Text ist länger und wird abgeschnitten.
> Letzter Status: Change T17907

(d) Im Edit-Modus eines Incidents werden nicht alle Read-Only-Felder im Zustand read only (also grau) angezeigt
Letzter Status: Problem T17908

(e) Nach Absenden einen Tickets kommt es zu Fehlermeldung: Ex existiert bereits ein Objekt mit der ID <guid>
Letzter Status: Vorübergehendes Problem, trat nur anfänglich auf, jetzt nicht mehr.

Self Service Portal Bereich Personal Data
------------------------------------------------
(a) Auswahlliste zum Ändern des Delegates ist nicht übersichtlich. Problem wie bei den Categories
Letzter Status: Problem 17909

Store -Masterdata -Hardware Inventory
----------------------------------------------
(a) CPU Type, No of Cores wird nicht erkannt
Letzter Status: T17430/T17431 (gelöst)

(b) Leere Einträge in bestimmten Bereichen wie z.B. Graphics Card oder Drives existieren immer noch
Letzter Status: T17430/T17431 (gelöst)

Store -Service Desk Incidents
----------------------------------
(a) Löschen von Incidents einfach möglich
Letzter Status: Berechtigungen setzen um es zu verbieten. Vorschlag akzeptiert.

(b) Gruppieren nach Spalten verursacht Fehlermeldung
Letzter Status: Problem T17910

o-----------------------------------------------------------------------o
Original-Text
Sehr geehrte Herren,

folgende Fehler müssen wir leider noch zusätzlich melden. Die 10 Fehler sind in einem PDF zusammengefasst, welches angehängt ist. Zum Ticket #T17657 - Morphosys: Problem mit der UltraWebToolbar Control in IE 7 und IE 8 haben wir ein Update: wenn direkt nach dem Scriptfehler ein Refresh des Webbrowsers macht, wird die Anzeige korrigiert. Dies ist auch nochmals im angehängten PDF erklärt.

Ich werde zusammen mit Herrn Bauer um 9:30 an der Remote-Session teilnehmen.

Wir bitten Sie unsere Problem zu priorisieren, da wir nun seit mehr als 2 Monaten mit Einführungsproblem kämpfen und nicht vorankommen. Es müssen nun dringend alle Probleme gelöst werden. 

Best Regards / Mit freundlichen Grüßen, 

Steffen Pohlenz
MorphoSys AG
Steffen Pohlenz
Head of IT

From: Christian Bauer

To: 'support@update4u.de'

Subject: RE: #T17657 - Morphosys: Problem mit der UltraWebToolbar Control in IE 7 und IE 8

 Hallo Herr Essig, hallo Herr Runkel,

 die Dateien unter „%SYSTEMROOT%\Microsoft.NET\Framework\v2.0.50727\Temporary ASP.NET Files\sps“ wurden entfernt. 

Leider bestehen die Fehler weiterhin.

Fehlermeldung beim Ändern der Gruppierung

-> siehe PDF Dokument „Fehlermeldung beim Ändern der Gruppierung.pdf“


Fehlermeldung beim Starten des Servicestore

-> siehe PDF Dokument „Error Initializing the UltraWebToolbar.pdf“

Mit freundlichen Grüßen

Christian Bauer

From: support@update4u.de [mailto:support@update4u.de] 
Sent: Monday, September 21, 2009 12:04 PM
To: Christian Bauer
Subject: #T17657 - Morphosys: Problem mit der UltraWebToolbar Control in IE 7 und IE 8

 Sehr geehrter Herr Bauer, 

wir haben Ihre Anfrage erhalten und unter der o.g. Ticketnummer erfasst. 
Wenn Sie uns weitere Informationen zu dieser Anfrage senden, antworten Sie bitte direkt auf diese Email. 

Bitte versuchen Sie einmal, die temporären Dateien im Cache des Webservers zu löschen: 
%SYSTEMROOT%\Microsoft.NET\Framework\v2.0.50727\Temporary ASP.NET Files\sps 

Verschieben Sie den Inhalt des Ordners, inklusive aller Unterordner, z.B. nach C:\temp\IISChache\. 
Falls sich während des Verschiebens Dateien im Zugriff befinden, führen Sie vorher "IISRESET -STOP" aus, verschieben Sie die Daten und führen Sie abschließend wieder "IISRESET -START" aus. 

Versuchen Sie anschließend, die Console von einem der betroffenen Rechner aus aufzurufen und geben Sie mir ein kurzes Feedback über das Ergebnis. 

Freundliche Grüße aus Karlsruhe, 

Ihr Support Team

Problem.Subject: INVENTORY/Filter;: es lassen sich in der Liste die Eigenschaften des Clients nicht mehr darstellen
Problem.description:
In der Management Console unter INVENTORY/Filter lassen sich in der rechten Liste die Eigenschaften des Clients nicht mehr darstellen. Fenster öffnet sich nicht mehr

### Nachgestellt von HAE und RSehrig ###
V14, Patch 01
Problem.Solution:
Property is fixed in dev/Inventory/v14_1 and release/v14_sp2_hf

Property dialog is now shown on double click on computer in Inventory computer list or on context menu Properties.
